title: Handbuilt Bicycles From Namibia: Miranda Miller Visits Onguza Bicycles
content:
In the latest episode of 'Here, There, and Everywhere,' SRAM's Miranda Miller takes us inside the custom build process with Onguza Bicycles in Namibia.

Read the full article at Handbuilt Bicycles From Namibia: Miranda Miller Visits Onguza Bicycles on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
